content: {"Name": "DUTCHESS OUTREACH LUNCH BOX", "Entity_Id": 872, "Category": "Community Meal/Soup Kitchen", "Subcategory": "Community Meal/Soup Kitchen", "Organization": "Dutchess Outreach", "More_Information": "Call to verify hours of operation and to see if an appointment is required", "Counties": ["Dutchess"], "Location": "In the back of the FPC, follow signs for the Lunch Box.", "Address": "29 North Hamilton Street - Suite 202", "City": "Poughkeepsie", "State": "NY", "Zip": "12601", "Phone": "(845)454-3792, ext 3096", "Hours_of_Operation": "Every Sunday 12:00PM 1:00PM \\n Every Monday 11:15AM 1:00PM \\n Every Monday 5:00PM 6:00PM \\n Every Tuesday 11:15AM 1:00PM\\n Every Tuesday 5:00PM 6:00PM\\n Every Wednesday 11:15AM 1:00PM \\n Every Wednesday 5:00PM 6:00PM \\n Every Thursday 11:15AM 1:00PM \\n Every Thursday 5:00PM 6:00PM \\n Every Friday 11:15AM 1:00PM \\n Every Friday 5:00PM 6:00PM", "Cost": "", "Accepts": "", "Website": "https://dutchessoutreach.org/the-lunch-box/", "Coalition": 0, "CFAN": 0, "Latitude": "41.7040662", "Longitude": "-73.921268", "Last_Updated": "09-22-2023", "icon": "marker-FF715B", "collection_name": "Food Pantries within the Capital District", "collection_category": "Food Pantry"}
